## Is your feature request related to a problem?

A clear and concise description of what the problem is.
Ex. "I need to sync agent files across multiple tools, but currently..."

## Describe the solution you'd like

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Use case

Describe your use case and how this feature would help you manage AI agent files (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, skills directories, etc.).

## Describe alternatives you've considered

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or workarounds you've tried.

## Additional context

Add any other context, examples, or references about the feature request here.
